Uses of Interface
org.strongback.components.Relay

  • Packages that use Relay 
    Package Description
    org.strongback.components
    This package defines a set of components that mirror real actuator, sensors, and other devices.
    org.strongback.drive  
    org.strongback.hardware  

    • Uses of Relay in org.strongback.components

      Methods in org.strongback.components that return Relay 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Relay PneumaticsModule.automaticMode()
      Get the relay that controls whether the module automatically runs the compressor when the PneumaticsModule.lowPressureSwitch() is triggered and shuts if off when the switch is untriggered (i.e., the maximum pressure threshold is reached).
      static Relay Relay.fixed(Relay.State state)
      Obtain a relay that remains in one fixed state, regardless of any calls to on() or off().
      static Relay Relay.instantaneous(Consumer<Boolean> switcher, BooleanSupplier onState)
      Obtain a relay that instantaneously switches from one state to another using the given functions.
      Relay Relay.off()
      Turn off this relay.
      Relay Relay.on()
      Turn on this relay.

    • Uses of Relay in org.strongback.drive

      Constructors in org.strongback.drive with parameters of type Relay 
      Constructor and Description
      TankDrive(Motor left, Motor right, Relay shifter)
      Creates a new DriveSystem subsystem that uses the supplied drive train and optional shifter.
      TankDrive(Motor left, Motor right, Relay shifter, DoubleToDoubleFunction speedLimiter)
      Creates a new DriveSystem subsystem that uses the supplied drive train and optional shifter.

    • Uses of Relay in org.strongback.hardware

      Methods in org.strongback.hardware that return Relay 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Relay Hardware.Solenoids.relay(int channel)
      Create a relay on the specified channel.
